methods.Synopsis: Retrieves a list of all available cities.

parameters.Name: client
parameters.Description: Your unique user ID. We provide it to you :)

parameters.Name: token
parameters.Description: Your unique authorization token. Keep it secret, keep it safe.

methods.Synopsis: Retrieves a list of all available cities.

parameters.Name: client
parameters.Description: Your unique user ID. We provide it to you :)

parameters.Name: token
parameters.Description: Your unique authorization token. Keep it secret, keep it safe.

parameters.Name: uri
parameters.Description: The URI you would like to test. For non-HTTP tests, it will be parsed into a domain

parameters.Name: services
parameters.Description: "http": "Where’s It Up? API performs an HTTP HEAD request against the specified URL", "dig": "The system performs a dig lookup of the provided domain.", "trace": "The system performs a traceroute -T lookup on the provided domain.", "ping": "The system performs a ping -i 0.5 -n -q -c 10 lookup on the provided domain.", "edge": "Where’s It Up? API downloads a file from a remote server. edge supports range parameters. It then returns the timing details, and the hash of downloaded file."

parameters.Name: sources
parameters.Description: The locations (cities) that you want to test from. Every source will perform every requested service.

parameters.Name: method
parameters.Description: By default, the system performs a HEAD request. You may alternately specify a GET request

parameters.Name: headers
parameters.Description: The system includes User-Agent: wheresitup.com/v3. This indicates that the request is from Where’s It Up. You may override this inclusion, or specify additional headers to the request. We reserve the right to update the version number as the system develops.
